actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate and maintain a replacement dam for the existing American Falls Dam of the Upper Snake River Basin project, Idaho, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain a replacement dam for the existing American Falls Dam of the Upper Snake River Basin project, Idaho. Authorizes to be appropriated $29,000,000 for the replacement dam, and such sums as are required for operation and maintenance of the project.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate and maintain a replacement dam for the existing American Falls Dam of the Upper Snake River Basin project, Idaho, and for other purposes.
